decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1706-P-009 Rev A and 1706-P-010 Rev A received: 08/11/2017. 1706-P-001 Rev B, 1706-P-002 Rev B, 1706-P-003 Rev B, 1706-P-004 Rev B, 1706-P-005 Rev C, 1706-P-006 Rev C, 1706-P-007 Rev C, and 1706-P-008 Rev C received: 06/12/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a rear outrigger extension to the first floor flat including juliette balcony, tiled pitched roof and two roof lights.
